name: webappdevelopment
description:
This lab introduces node.js as a server-side technology.



You will use node.js to run javaScript programs on the "server-side" which are capable of servicing HTTP requests.



You will learn how to:



-Set node up as a HTTP server. -Use Node's built in http module to create a simple HTTP server. -Node's packaging system.
author: Davin Fortune
